title: Introducing: Laurasia
content:
Australia once again proving why it’s leagues ahead of the game when it comes to exciting, electronic pop music.

Having only been around for a matter of months, and their debut single only uploaded a few days ago, it’s clearly very very early days, for Laurasia, but if Rainmaker is anything to go by, then they’re definitely one to keep an eye out for. Mixing off-kilter pop with more radio ready influences, the likes of Grouplove and CHVRCHES spring to mind, it’s vibrant, colourful and just downright enjoyable. Check out Rainmaker below, thanks to Hillydilly for the heads up.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
